/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling intersection in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The intersection is a hive of activity, with cars and buses navigating their way through the roads. The roads themselves are lined with trees and buildings, adding a touch of urban greenery to the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
